response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This product offers unparalleled capabilities and efficiency, setting new standards in its field. Given its unique features and potential impact, we believe it's worth more than just its monetary value. We are offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $850,000. This is an exclusive chance to secure a game-changing asset at a discounted rate. We trust that you will find immense value in this product, and we look forward to discussing how it can benefit your endeavors. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Let's embark on this journey together towards innovation and success.", "product_price": 850000}
